General.Name: JCHX Mining Management Co Ltd
General.Description: JCHX Mining Management Co.,Ltd. engages in mine engineering, development, and construction activities in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It is also involved in the contract mining business; and research and development of non-ferrous, ferrous, and chemical products. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No.28 Shuiyuan West Road, Beijing, China, 101500
